sentence.text: In a two-stage study, we analyzed the existing genome-wide association study dataset of 868 pancreatic cancer patients from MD Anderson Cancer Center in relation to overall survival using generation of precursor metabolites and energy regression.

entity.text: generation of precursor metabolites and energy

sentence.text: According to The Cancer Genome Atlas data and our previous RNA-sequencing data, the mRNA expression level of negative regulation of translational initiation but not N-acetylglucosamine metabolic process, L-methylmalonyl-CoA metabolic process or monocyte activation involved in immune response was significantly lower in pancreatic tumors than in normal adjacent tissues.

entity.text: monocyte activation involved in immune response

sentence.text: Additional validation efforts and functional studies are warranted to demonstrate whether negative regulation of translational initiation is a novel tumor suppressor gene and a potential therapeutic target for pancreatic cancer
